`$=customJS.dv_funcs.mentionedIn(dv)`

A [[herb]] that commonly used in [[tea]]s as a general relaxant. It is promoted for sleeplessness, [[anxiety]], and gastrointestinal conditions such as upset stomach, gas, and diarrhea. 
 ^[[[course_Dr. K's Guide to Mental Health]]]

**See**::
*`$=customJS.dv_funcs.outlinedIn(dv, this)`*
